name: outlier_detection
description: Tests detection of statistical outliers and impossible values
notes: age: -5 is impossible (negative age), 150 is implausible
bmi: -5.2 is impossible (negative BMI), 850.0 is impossible
read_count: -5000 is impossible, 999999999 is statistical outlier
dna_concentration: 0.5 is very low, 1250.0 is unusually high
a260_a280: 3.50 is too high (should be ~1.8-2.0), 0.25 is too low
not_measured in dna_concentration should be flagged as missing value pattern
